about.title: About me
about.subtitle: Discover my story
about.paragraph1: My passion for technology was born from the desire to build solutions that truly add value to people’s lives. It’s not just about writing code, but about understanding problems, crafting smart responses, and translating them into intuitive and functional digital experiences. From the start, I have sought to balance the technical with the human side, believing that web development is a powerful tool when put at the service of real needs.
about.paragraph2: Throughout my career, I have worked with various technologies and methodologies, which has taught me to adapt quickly and always prioritize quality. I enjoy collaborating with multidisciplinary teams, sharing knowledge, and maintaining a mindset of continuous improvement. I believe in writing clean code, building sustainable products, and learning something new every day.
about.paragraph3: Beyond the tools I use, what truly drives me is the possibility of creating something meaningful. I seek to be involved in purposeful projects, surrounded by committed people, where technology is not the end but the means to generate positive impact. This vision guides every step of my professional journey.

education.title: Education
education.subtitle: My Academic History
education.paragraph1: My academic background and specialized courses.

items.title: Technical Program in Programming Fundamentals
items.subtitle: Academy CADIF1
items.desc: Technical program in programming fundamentals, with a focus on computational logic, algorithms with PSeInt and an introduction to programming oriented to objects.

items.title: Technical Program in frontend junior
items.subtitle: Academy CADIF1
items.desc: The Junior Frontend technical course covers the development of web interfaces using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It includes the use of preprocessors like Sass and the implementation of CSS frameworks to optimize design. The focus is on creating modern, accessible, and responsive websites.

items.title: Frontend Master Technical Program
items.subtitle: CADIF1 Academy
items.desc: The Frontend Master program focuses on the advanced use of frameworks and modern technologies for web development. It includes learning frameworks such as AngularJS, ReactJS, and VueJS, as well as developing hybrid mobile applications with Ionic. It also covers the use of TypeScript to enhance code quality and scalability in JavaScript.

items.title: Backend Technical Program with Node.js
items.subtitle: CADIF1 Academy
items.desc: The Frontend Master program focuses on the advanced use of frameworks and modern technologies for web development. It includes learning frameworks such as AngularJS, ReactJS, and VueJS, as well as developing hybrid mobile applications with Ionic. It also covers the use of TypeScript to improve the quality and scalability of JavaScript code.

items.title: Web Design and Development Course
items.subtitle: MasterD Academy
items.desc: The Web Design and Development Course aims to equip students with the knowledge and skills necessary to start their professional careers as web designers, web developers, or full-stack developers. The program includes the use of PHP, user experience (UX) and user interface (UI) design, development with WordPress, JavaScript and AJAX, as well as MySQL database management.

work.title: Work
work.subtitle: My Professional History
work.paragraph: My work experience and professional background.

items.title: IT Solutions Development Technician (Remote)
items.description: I worked remotely for a Chilean company providing academic support to university students, developing IT tasks and projects, including programming, databases, and theses. I undertook both greenfield projects and enhancements to existing works with complete autonomy. Additionally, I built websites and prototypes for real clients, utilizing tools like Adobe XD and Photoshop when necessary. This experience strengthened my technical, design, and professional communication skills.
achievements: Full-cycle development of academic and professional IT projects.
Autonomous management of tasks from analysis to final delivery.
Design of functional interfaces and prototypes using Adobe XD and Photoshop.
Delivery of customized solutions for real clients and students.
Optimization of code performance and clarity in technical documentation.

items.title: Freelance Full Stack Developer
items.description: I worked as a full stack developer on the development of a decentralized wallet mobile app for iOS and Android. I collaborated remotely with a Colombian team consisting of developers, project managers, and designers. We followed agile methodologies with daily meetings, task management through Jira, and version control using GitHub. I implemented frontend and backend features, actively contributing to the technical progress of the project.
achievements: Full stack development of a decentralized wallet mobile app for iOS and Android.
Active collaboration with a multidisciplinary remote team (development, design, and management).
Implementation of frontend and backend features with a modular and scalable approach.
Task management using Jira and version control via GitHub.
Daily participation in agile follow-up meetings.
